buildCommandDescription: Builds Angular project and packs for SFDC deployment
initCommandDescription: Initializes config and files for plugin
ngPathFlagDescription: Relative path to Angular project (folder with angular.json)
sfdcPathFlagDescription: Relative path to SFDC target dir
promptCreateDir: Do you want to create folder? (y/n)
promptRewriteFile: File already exists. Do you want to rewrite it (all contents will be lost)? (y/n)
